
% --------------------------------------------- ts225 ---------------------------------------------

% Name: ts225 ==> 225-city problem (Juenger,Raecke,Tschoecke)

    [4000 , 4000 , 4000 , 4000 , 4000 , 4000 , 4000 , 4000 , 4000 , 4000 , 4000 , 4000 , 4000 , ...
